Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: People today's budget news is going to shake up the game for citizens and residents with announcements rolling out on several issues. Amongst others NAB predicts interest hikes Defense Ministers are gathering to discuss workforce needed for Aukus submarines and an $11.4m spend goes into expanding the skills required for the nuclear-powered submarine programme. Meanwhile there is hope that extra funding will speed up visa processing for those fleeing the Taliban clean green and cheaper power for Aussies and concern about a looming $1b welfare bill should New Zealand residents be granted citizenship.
